Articles.Content:
Kerbal enginers designed a tower for testing the courage and stubidity of the new recruits. Jeb heard about the tower and when no one was looking quickly jumped at the chance to show everyone how a real kerbal does it.

Sigh i wish he hadnt jumped at the chance so quickly being the famous kerbal he is. Lucky he has a hard head

http://imgur.com/a/yTVGj#A0T1MGJ
